thread.section_title: Impericon Bewertungen | Kundenbewertungen von Impericon | www.impericon.com | 4 von 132
thread.title: Rob Farthing

author: Rob Farthing
title: Rob Farthing
text:
Impericon always have my favourite bands stocked in, and their support team are very fast/always able to resolve all enquireies. Above all else, the delivery is tracked and fast, you cannot fault being able to see where your package is and know exactly when it will arrive!
They often change the stock each season to bring some variety which is nice, I hope all the bands I order merch from benefit greatly from Impericon's outstanding service.
